c.title: C Programming Basics
c.description: Learn the basics of C programming, including data types, variables, operators, control structures, and functions.

c.title: Arrays and Strings in C
c.description: Understand how to use arrays and strings in C programming, including array declaration, initialization, accessing array elements, and string manipulation.

c.title: Pointers in C
c.description: Learn about the concept of pointers in C programming and how to use them to manipulate data directly in memory.

c.title: Dynamic Memory Allocation in C
c.description: Learn how to allocate and deallocate memory dynamically in C programming using functions such as malloc, calloc, and realloc.

c.title: Structures and Unions in C
c.description: Learn how to use structures and unions in C programming, including declaration, initialization, accessing structure elements, and typecasting.

c.title: File Input/Output in C
c.description: Understand how to perform file input/output operations in C programming, including opening, closing, reading, and writing files.

c.title: Recursion in C
c.description: Learn how to implement recursive functions in C programming, including base case, recursive case, and stack overflow.

c.title: Advanced Data Structures in C
c.description: Learn about advanced data structures such as trees, graphs, and hash tables, and how to implement them in C programming.

topics.title: Binary Trees and Binary Search Trees

c.title: Concurrency in C
c.description: Understand how to write concurrent programs in C using threads, synchronization, and mutual exclusion techniques.

c.title: Socket Programming in C
c.description: Learn how to create network applications using socket programming in C, including socket creation, binding, and connecting.

c.title: OpenGL Programming in C
c.description: Understand how to create 2D and 3D graphics using OpenGL programming in C, including basic OpenGL functions, rendering, and shading.

c.title: Compiler Design in C
c.description: Learn how to design and implement a compiler in C programming, including lexical analysis, parsing, semantic analysis, code generation, and optimization.

c.title: Embedded Systems Programming in C
c.description: Understand how to program embedded systems using C programming, including hardware interfaces, interrupts, and timers.

topics.title: Interrupts and Timers in Embedded Systems
Real-time Operating Systems for Embedded Systems
Debugging and Testing Embedded Systems Programs

c.title: Data Structures and Algorithms in C
c.description: Learn about data structures and algorithms using C programming, including arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, sorting, and searching.

topics.title: Introduction to Data Structures and Algorithms

c.title: Parallel Programming in C
c.description: Understand how to write parallel programs in C using OpenMP, MPI, and CUDA.
